video.title: Terrace House: Boys & Girls in the City
video.synopsis: A new set of six men and women start their lives together under one roof. All they get is a fabulous home and a car. As always, there is no script.

episodes.synopsis: One summer’s day, six young strangers move into a house together and start living an unscripted drama.
episodes.title: New Boys, New Girls, New City

episodes.synopsis: Everyone changes into swimsuits after lunch and heads to the pool on the terrace. The boys are excited at the sight of the girls in their swimsuits.
episodes.title: Three Crushes

episodes.synopsis: The roommates celebrate tap dancer Yuki’s birthday. However, his harsh words trigger tears from both Mizuki and Yuriko.
episodes.title: Dream Police

episodes.synopsis: Makoto and Minori go out to dinner alone together. Yuki asks Yuriko out on a date, but she's had a bit too much sake to drink. What will she say?
episodes.title: In Tears Again

episodes.synopsis: Tatsuya rocks the house by declaring he’ll take each of the three girls on a date this summer. Meanwhile, something is up with Minori and Makoto.
episodes.title: Eenie Meenie Miney Mo

episodes.synopsis: Tatsuya declared he would go on a date with all three of the girls. First comes Mizuki, and next is Yuriko, but her date opens a whole can of worms.
episodes.title: All Screwed Up

episodes.synopsis: Makoto angers Tatsuya with his rash behavior but shows no signs of remorse, creating a touch-and-go situation in the boys' room.
episodes.title: Showing His True Colors

episodes.synopsis: Minori loses interest as she sees how Makoto behaves. Tatsuya reflects on his dates with the three girls in an effort to choose one as his lover.
episodes.title: Late Night Poolside

episodes.synopsis: Tatsuya and Minori go on a second date. Tatsuya tells her how he feels but says she need not give her answer now. Makoto has a present for Minori.
episodes.title: What a Good Day!

episodes.synopsis: Unable to forget her ex, Yuriko calls and asks to see him. Meanwhile, after receiving a present from Makoto, Minori talks to him about her feelings.
episodes.title: Before He Says the Words...

episodes.synopsis: At the Girls Award event, Tatsuya and Minori meet former member Seina, who encourages their budding relationship. A new member arrives from overseas.
episodes.title: Boy from the Rainbow State

episodes.synopsis: Tatsuya finally asks Minori to officially be his girlfriend. How will she answer? Hawaii-born Arman, the newest housemate, asks Mizuki out on a date.
episodes.title: Is She Just Best of Three?

episodes.synopsis: Yuriko confesses her feelings to her ex before leaving the house. And her ex’s reply? The boys get excited over the arrival of the new girl member.
episodes.title: Who Will Survive?

episodes.synopsis: Arisa's arrival to the house excites Arman and Yuki because she's "their type." Meanwhile, Tatsuya and Minori find it difficult to take the next step.
episodes.title: Ikujinashi

episodes.synopsis: A kiss takes Tatsuya and Minori’s relationship to the next level. Arisa and Arman head to Mt. Takao on a date. But Mizuki also has feelings for Arman.
episodes.title: Heating Up for Someone Else

episodes.synopsis: Arisa grows closer to Arman after having gone out on a number of dates. Yuki, who also hopes to ask Arisa out, tries hard to steal her attention.
episodes.title: Magic Spell Costco

episodes.synopsis: Arman et al. prepare the Japanese-style room for Minori and Tatsuya, now a couple. Asari promises she will go anywhere with Arman if he wins his game.
episodes.title: Anywhere for You

episodes.synopsis: Minori confesses her relationship issues with Tatsuya to her older sister, Kurumi, who asks Minori whether the two are having make-up sex or not.
episodes.title: Worst Date Ever
